testsuite.name: TicTacToeTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #6
Your last field contains unfinished game, the game should be finished!
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
--------- | | | | | | --------- Player X, enter coordinates: > 4 5 Coordinates should be from 1 to 3! > 3 1 --------- | | | | | X | --------- Player O, enter coordinates: > 1 2 --------- | | | O | | X | --------- Player X, enter coordinates: > 4 3 Coordinates should be from 1 to 3! > 4 3 Coordinates should be from 1 to 3! > 1 2 This cell is occupied! Choose another one! > 4 1 Coordinates should be from 1 to 3! > 2 1 --------- | | | O | | X X | --------- Player O, enter coordinates: > 4 3 Coordinates should be from 1 to 3! > 1 4 Coordinates should be from 1 to 3! > 4 2 Coordinates should be from 1 to 3! > 2 3 --------- | O | | O | | X X | --------- Player X, enter coordinates: > 3 1 This cell is occupied! Choose another one! > 3 2 --------- | O | | O X | | X X | --------- O wins
